review_blob: Almost over the top hoppy with fuggles (but first was a little warm, once it go nice and cold was much better).  Decent aroma, but almost unpleasant at times.
Wonderful aroma, great balance with bitterness.  Does not try to be too much in any category, just plain good!
Quite flat, sweet and malty (like an english mild).  Very little aroma or bitterness.  Carmel like.  It tastes almost like unfermented wort.
